table.name: [dbo].[PhotoObj]
table.summary: The main PhotoObj table for the PSCz catalog
table.remarks: The main PhotoObj table for the PSCz catalog

column.name: [iq_12]
column.summary: Flux origin and quality flag, 12 um

column.name: [iq_25]
column.summary: Flux origin and quality flag, 25 um

column.name: [iq_60]
column.summary: Flux origin and quality flag, 60 um

column.name: [iq_100]
column.summary: Flux origin and quality flag, 100 um

column.name: [ises_12]
column.summary: SES flag, derived from SES2, 12 um

column.name: [ises_25]
column.summary: SES flag, derived from SES2, 25 um

column.name: [ises_60]
column.summary: SES flag, derived from SES2, 60 um

column.name: [ises_100]
column.summary: SES flag, derived from SES2, 100 um

column.name: [mine]
column.summary: Minor axe of 2 sig er ellipse

column.name: [maje]
column.summary: Major axe of 2 sig er ellipse,

column.name: [ises1_12]
column.summary: nearby seconds confirmed extended sources, 12 um

column.name: [ises1_25]
column.summary: nearby seconds confirmed extended sources, 25 um

column.name: [ises1_60]
column.summary: nearby seconds confirmed extended sources, 60 um

column.name: [ises1_100]
column.summary: nearby seconds confirmed extended sources, 100 um

column.name: [nhcon]
column.summary: Number of HCONS with source detected

column.name: [num]
column.summary: Identifier for igal source on this plate

column.name: [iarh]
column.summary: RA hours of best optical id

column.name: [iarm]
column.summary: RA mins of best optical id

column.name: [iars]
column.summary: RA secs of best optical id INTEGER PART!

column.name: [ars]
column.summary: RA secs of best optical id DECIMAL PART!

column.name: [iadd]
column.summary: Dec DEG part of best optical id

column.name: [iadm]
column.summary: Dec MINS part of best optical id

column.name: [iads]
column.summary: Dec SEC INTEGER part of best optical id

column.name: [ads]
column.summary: Dec SEC DECIMAL part of best optical id

column.name: [ivhel]
column.summary: Best heliocentric Vel from Literature or PSCz.

column.name: [ivgal]
column.summary: Velocity cz in LG frame (IVHEL + 300 sin(l) cos(b))

column.name: [platex]
column.summary: posn from bottom left corner of Schmidt plate in mm

column.name: [platey]
column.summary: posn from bottom left corner of Schmidt plate in mm

column.name: [carea]
column.summary: h=high|b|, p=other PSCz, l=low|b|, c=in coverage gaps (NULL allowed)

column.name: [abb]
column.summary: Extinction A_B in lune bin derived from 100 um background, dust temp corrected (see note)

column.name: [mhconb]
column.summary: 2/3 HCON sky, calculated on lune bin basis

column.name: [iw50]
column.summary: HI 50% vel width, codes as IW20

column.name: [fp_12]
column.summary: Addscan flux using point source template

column.name: [fp_25]
column.summary: Addscan flux using point source template

column.name: [fp_60]
column.summary: Addscan flux using point source template

column.name: [fp_100]
column.summary: Addscan flux using point source template

column.name: [ibp_12]
column.summary: 1 for background fit, 0 for none (extended or bright)

column.name: [ibp_25]
column.summary: 1 for background fit, 0 for none (extended or bright)

column.name: [ibp_60]
column.summary: 1 for background fit, 0 for none (extended or bright)

column.name: [ibp_100]
column.summary: 1 for background fit, 0 for none (extended or bright)

column.name: [fe_12]
column.summary: Rice or Yahil/Addscan flux for source with size given by WIDTH2

column.name: [fe_25]
column.summary: Rice or Yahil/Addscan flux for source with size given by WIDTH2

column.name: [fe_60]
column.summary: Rice or Yahil/Addscan flux for source with size given by WIDTH2

column.name: [fe_100]
column.summary: Rice or Yahil/Addscan flux for source with size given by WIDTH2

column.name: [ibe_12]
column.summary: 1 for background fit, 0 for none (extended or bright), 2 = Rice

column.name: [ibe_25]
column.summary: 1 for background fit, 0 for none (extended or bright), 2 = Rice

column.name: [ibe_60]
column.summary: 1 for background fit, 0 for none (extended or bright), 2 = Rice

column.name: [ibe_100]
column.summary: 1 for background fit, 0 for none (extended or bright), 2 = Rice
